lexUnit.name: slam.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: push or put somewhere with great force.

sentence.text: Charles got in and slammed the door .
Slamming a door in someone 's face has nothing to do with breeding or upbringing .
The other girl laid the last of the flowers in position , and slammed the van doors shut .
He ducked out of number twenty-three and slammed shut the door .
Vologsky slammed his fist down upon the table as the injustice of it all descended upon him again .
He slammed his fist down angrily on the console and turned to the twinkling carrying case .
He slammed his clenched fist into the desk , and began to cry .
He slammed the phone down and allowed himself a small smile .
He slammed the phone back into its cradle , and Belinda winced .
Angrily she tore her hand away from Rune 's clasp and slammed it palm-down on the table .
Hitch slammed the cassette hard against the crate .
Jay could have slammed her head against the table and wept .
I was so worked up , I kept slamming my bed against the wall , banging on windows , turning the taps on .
Ace slammed a magazine into her finished gun .
Dan felt an urge to take back his fist and slam it into the old woman 's teeth .
He slammed the full magazine into the weapon and gripped it for a moment , the veins in his temple throbbing angrily .
She banged his head on the till , slamming his hand in the drawer , and he ran off with only half a 20 pound note .
Slamming her hand on the table , cutting off the other girl in mid-sentence , she denied frantically , ` No ! "
Maxim slammed the steering wheel with both hands , nearly hard enough to break it , certainly hard enough to make both palms sting .
Dropping her soap-bag on top of the folded clothes , she slammed the case lid down and ferociously snapped the fastenings .
He slammed his hand down on the top of the dressing table , causing some of the bottles to topple over .
John and his friend then began to fight back and were gaining the upper hand when the police intervened slamming them up against a wall with their arms pinned behind their backs .
He slammed down the receiver .
He slammed down a tin of cleansing cream .
He turned on his heel , picked up the painting , and left the villa , slamming the door behind him .
And with that I slammed the boot lid down .
Maxim slammed the steering wheel with both hands , nearly hard enough to break it , certainly hard enough to make both palms sting .
" Get outside this , " she said , slamming the tin mug of coffee in front of him , and sawing away energetically at the loaf .
He let out a whoop , and slammed the gun down onto the bar , breaking glasses .
Both men went hurtling backwards , Scott slamming the newcomer 's head against the bathroom cabinet .
Ferdi slammed the car door and buttoned his jacket , sniffing the clean soft Mediterranean night air appreciatively .
She heard him slam the front room door and went back into the bedroom .
He was off-balance , his defences down as Ward drew back his right arm and slammed that gloved hand straight into the sallow face .
I was so worked up , I kept slamming my bed against the wall , banging on windows , turning the taps on .
` Five ! " he carolled , and slammed his little hand down on Vitor 's big one .
